title: 2019 CNN Heroes: How to Vote
text:
Story highlights You can help choose the 2019 CNN Hero of the Year

Voting continues through Tuesday, Dec. 3

The CNN Hero of the Year will be revealed during 'CNN Heroes: An All-Star Tribute.'

(CNN) READY TO VOTE? HERE'S HOW:

Go to CNNHeroes.com and click through to our voting page.

You have ten votes per day to help your favorite Heroes.

Click VOTE beneath a Hero you would like to support. Then, use the slider to register your votes.

You can give all 10 votes to one Hero or spread them across several who inspire you.

Read More
description: There are three ways to vote for the CNN Hero of the Year. Here's how!
